name: Footprints Festival

config_properties.name: Footprints Festival
config_properties.description: A curated discovery festival at TivoliVredenburg in Utrecht, showcasing emerging international artists across diverse genres.

ai_profile:
The 2026 Footprints Festival brings together an eclectic mix of 11 artists, showcasing a rich tapestry of global sounds and diverse genres. From the pulsating beats of Electronic music to the soulful strains of Malian desert blues and the intricate melodies of Traditional Iranian and Armenian folk, the festival is a celebration of musical diversity. Notable genre trends include a strong presence of Electronic (3 artists) and Psychedelic (2 artists) sounds, complemented by Jazz, Indie Pop, and other unique styles like Afrobeat, 80s-inspired, and minimalist electropop.

This year's lineup highlights remarkable geographic diversity, with artists hailing from 10 countries, including Germany, France, Brazil, Turkey, and Nigeria. The festival also champions representation, with 7 performers identifying as people of color, offering a platform for voices from underrepresented communities. Gender representation sees 2 female artists, 8 male artists, and 1 mixed-gender group, reflecting a step toward inclusivity in the music industry.

Critically well-received, the festival boasts an impressive average artist rating of 7.73, with a majority of acts receiving scores between 8 and 9. Every featured artist is accessible on Spotify, ensuring audiences can explore their music before and after the event. Footprints Festival 2026 promises to deliver a unique and boundary-pushing musical experience, bringing together artists from diverse backgrounds and genres to create a vibrant celebration of global music.
